Financial: Military retirement pay exclusion from state income tax
Oklahoma Department of Veterans Affairs emergency assistance
Small business loans and grants for veterans
Education: Oklahoma Tuition Waiver for Veterans - free tuition for veterans at state schools
Scholarships for dependents of disabled/deceased veterans
In-state tuition for veterans using GI Bill
Recreation: Free hunting and fishing licenses for 100% disabled veterans
Reduced-fee licenses for other disabled veterans
Housing: Disabled Veterans Property Tax Exemption - full exemption for 100% disabled
Property tax exemption continues for surviving spouse
Oklahoma Housing Finance Agency veteran programs
Adaptive housing grants for disabled veterans
Other: Stand Down events for homeless veterans
